plot: Marcos and Javier are returning to the refuge where they hide from a terrible epidemic, when they feel forced to inspect the next house.
title: La Próxima Casa
plot_es: Marcos and Javier are returning to the refuge where they hide from a terrible epidemic, when they feel forced to inspect the next house.
plot_en: Marcos and Javier are returning to the refuge where they hide from a terrible epidemic, when they feel forced to inspect the next house.
